# Institute

- Go to institute menu showing institute list page. There is default showing 10 rows. 

<img src="../../admin/institute-list.png" />

-	When we need to add institute click Add Institute button. Now showing Add institute page. 

<img src="../../admin/add-institute.png" />

- ÔÅ∂	Enter valid institute details and click submit button.

-	Once institute created successfully return to institute page. This created institute showing in the list.

-	Enter valid institute details and click submit button.

<img src="../../admin/institute-list1.png" />

-	Anything actions needed in the institute list use action column edit icon and delete icon.
-	Edit icon use to update the institute details.
-	Delete icon used to delete this institute. This institute disabled. Also disabled this institute & based program, course also disabled. 

### REST API

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Institute List**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "paginate": {
                "offset": 0,
                "limit": 10,
                "sort": {
                    "key": false,
                    "sortKey": "",
                    "sortType": true
                },
                "search": {
                    "key": false,
                    "searchKey": "all",
                    "searchValue": ""
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: InstituteListRequest) {\n  getInstituteList(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Create Institute**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "body": {
                "instituteName": "AV Institute",
                "instituteCode": "AU001",
                "location": "Madurai",
                "status": 1,
                "description": "<p>test</p>",
                "email": "tech123@yopmail.com",
                "regNo": "AUREG001",
                "primary": 2
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: CreateInstituteRequest) {\n  createInstitute(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}

```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Get Institute ById**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fb7fbbe58f3ae55b5a82a"
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: GetInstituteByIdRequest) {\n  getInstituteById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}

```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Update Institute**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "64c23ec8a34205b3c43bbc01",
            "body": {
                "_id": "64c23ec8a34205b3c43bbc01",
                "instituteName": "Manipal",
                "instituteCode": "ma001",
                "regNo": "GTYYU",
                "location": "Chennai",
                "email": "manipaluniversity@yopmail.com",
                "primary": 2,
                "description": "<p>Lorium ipsum</p>",
                "createdBy": "640ada6258d90dfef2c435c0",
                "status": 1,
                "createdAt": "2023-07-27T09:54:16.744Z",
                "updatedAt": "2023-10-18T11:29:29.282Z",
                "__v": 0
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: UpdateInstituteRequest) {\n  updateInstitute(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}

```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Delete Institute**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "644b65d6c31b7091014d3d3d"
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: DeleteInstituteByIdRequest) {\n  deleteInstituteById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}

```
</dl>
